title: [dr-autosync] pitr checkpoint ts lag up to 15min after down backup dc
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
sh-4.2# /tiup/deploy/tikv-20160/bin/tikv-server -V
TiKV
Release Version:   6.5.3
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   852feae645973d2cca58c66fef99c32f95ccd1d3
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.5.0_fix_flashback
UTC Build Time:    2023-07-27 07:59:32
Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
```
[2023/08/03 14:47:05.658 +08:00] [INFO] [cluster.go:516] ["network partition will be inject"] [source="[tiup,tidb1,pd1,pd2,tikv1,tikv2,tikv3,benchtoolset,br,minio]"] [target="[tikv4,tikv5,tikv6,tidb2,pd3]"]
[2023/08/03 14:47:05.786 +08:00] [INFO] [util.go:68] ["waiting for workload running after chaos injected"] [wait=10m0s] [callBy=primary.go:188]
[2023/08/03 14:58:06.047 +08:00] [INFO] [cluster.go:516] ["network partition will be inject"] [source="[tiup,tikv1,tikv2,tikv3,tidb1,pd1,pd2,benchtoolset,br,minio]"] [target="[pd3,tikv4,tikv5,tikv6,tidb2]"]
[2023/08/03 14:58:06.426 +08:00] [INFO] [util.go:68] ["waiting for workload running after chaos injected"] [wait=10m0s] [callBy=primary.go:188]
[2023/08/03 15:09:06.672 +08:00] [INFO] [cluster.go:516] ["network partition will be inject"] [source="[tiup,tikv1,tikv2,tikv3,tidb1,pd1,pd2,benchtoolset,br,minio]"] [target="[tikv4,tikv5,tikv6,tidb2,pd3]"]
[2023/08/03 15:09:06.803 +08:00] [INFO] [util.go:68] ["waiting for workload running after chaos injected"] [wait=10m0s] [callBy=primary.go:188]
[2023/08/03 15:20:07.051 +08:00] [INFO] [cluster.go:516] ["network partition will be inject"] [source="[tiup,pd1,pd2,tikv1,tikv2,tikv3,tidb1,benchtoolset,br,minio]"] [target="[tidb2,pd3,tikv4,tikv5,tikv6]"]
[2023/08/03 15:20:07.687 +08:00] [INFO] [util.go:68] ["waiting for workload running after chaos injected"] [wait=10m0s] [callBy=primary.go:188]
```

### What did you expect?
```
The gap should not grow continually after down backup dc.
```

### What did happened?
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/9443637/7bfad580-29fc-4d2a-a6da-cb28ac8ca6c9)
